verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> fell הַגּוֹרָ֜ל <WH1486> And the lot לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> of the children יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> of Joseph מִיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> from Jordan יְרִיח֔וֹ <WH3405> by Jericho לְמֵ֥י <WH4325> unto the water יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho מִזְרָ֑חָה <WH4217> on the east הַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> to the wilderness עֹלֶ֧ה <WH5927> that goeth up מִירִיח֛וֹ <WH3405> from Jericho בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> throughout mount בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> Bethel

וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> And goeth out מִבֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> from Bethel ל֑וּזָה <WH3870> to Luz וְעָבַ֛ר <WH5674> and passeth along אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> unto the borders הָאַרְכִּ֖י <WH757> of Archi עֲטָרֽוֹת׃ <WH5852> to Ataroth

וְיָֽרַד־ <WH3381> And goeth down יָ֜מָּה <WH3220> westward אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> to the coast הַיַּפְלֵטִ֗י <WH3311> of Japhleti עַ֣ד <WH5704> far גְּב֧וּל <WH1366> unto the coast בֵּית־ חוֹרֹ֛ן <WH1032> of Bethhoron תַּחְתּ֖וֹן <WH8481> the nether וְעַד־ <WH5704> far גָּ֑זֶר <WH1507> and to Gezer וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become [תֹצְאֹתֹו כ] (תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> plenty ק) יָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> thereof are at the sea
וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> took their inheritance בְנֵי־ <WH1121> So the children יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> Manasseh וְאֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> and Ephraim

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> now גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> And the border בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become גְּב֤וּל <WH1366> was [thus] even the border נַחֲלָתָם֙ <WH5159> of their inheritance מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> on the east side עַטְר֣וֹת אַדָּ֔ר <WH5853> was Atarothaddar עַד־ <WH5704> far בֵּ֥ית חוֹרֹ֖ן <WH1032> unto Bethhoron עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> the upper

וְיָצָ֨א <WH3318> went out הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border הַיָּ֗מָּה <WH3220> toward the sea הַֽמִּכְמְתָת֙ <WH4366> to Michmethah מִצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> on the north side וְנָסַ֧ב <WH5437> went about הַגְּב֛וּל <WH1366> and the border מִזְרָ֖חָה <WH4217> eastward תַּאֲנַ֣ת שִׁלֹ֑ה <WH8387> unto Taanathshiloh וְעָבַ֣ר <WH5674> and passed אוֹת֔וֹ <WH853> מִמִּזְרַ֖ח <WH4217> by it on the east יָנֽוֹחָה׃ <WH3239> to Janohah

וְיָרַ֥ד <WH3381> And it went down מִיָּנ֖וֹחָה <WH3239> from Janohah עֲטָר֣וֹת <WH5852> to Ataroth וְנַעֲרָ֑תָה <WH5292> and to Naarath וּפָגַע֙ <WH6293> and came בִּֽירִיח֔וֹ <WH3405> to Jericho וְיָצָ֖א <WH3318> and went out הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> at Jordan

מִתַּפּ֜וּחַ <WH8599> from Tappuah יֵלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> continued הַגְּב֥וּל <WH1366> The border יָ֙מָּה֙ <WH3220> westward נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the river קָנָ֔ה <WH7071> Kanah וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the goings out הַיָּ֑מָּה <WH3220> thereof were at the sea זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> by their families

וְהֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> cities הַמִּבְדָּלוֹת֙ <WH3995> And the separate לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> for the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> [were] among נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> all the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִ֔ישׁוּ <WH3423> And they drave not out אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּגָ֑זֶר <WH1507> in Gezer וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> dwell הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֜י <WH3669> but the Canaanites בְּקֶ֤רֶב <WH7130> among אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> the Ephraimites עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> became לְמַס־ <WH4522> under tribute עֹבֵֽד׃ <WH5647> and serve פ
